name: Dungeon Boys (Demo)
description:
Game Description

Dungeon Boys is a labyrinth explorer role-playing video game created with Gdevelope. It occurs in an unidentified territory where the ruler desires champions from all over the land to defeat and conquer a dungeon that is causing deaths and misfortunes among his people. You, the player, are tasked with gathering heroes from different backgrounds to conquer the dungeon. As you advance through the labyrinth, your reputation will rise. The higher your reputation, the stronger champions you will obtain and the more exceptional upgrades you will unlock.

Game features

As you know by now, your reputation gives you stronger champions and allows you to unlock upgrades. Upgrades are special skills that you can give your champions so they can take on difficult monsters and bosses that roam the dungeon. Some skills can grant the user defensive abilities and some are so powerful that even the monsters are scared to use them. (below you can see  some upgrades)

 RageStrengthTough ArmorWarrior's Spirit

Unfortunately, I, the developer, couldn't finish these features in time for you to enjoy them, but they will be available in the Early Access.

Please check the game roadmap.

Game bugs

There are a few bugs in the game that I couldn't fix in time, and I wanted to upload the playtest to get some feedback on the sounds, visuals, and more, so I left them to be fixed in the Early Access.

The bugs are the following:

  • clicking too fast can cause players who are dead to start attacking
  • you can get characters stuck on top of each other in the shop/base
  • characters can be placed all over the page (LOL).

Thanks for playing the game!!!

NOTE:  some sounds can get delayed for some reason
